Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: So are the ethics of love of our beloved Lord difficult and beyond for us to understand. It is a very serious subject. As a drop of water merges with the water of the ocean, so does a devoted Sikh of the Guru becomes one with his beloved Lord. (75)
